mapper.select: /* csInfoMapper.selectCsInfo */ SELECT CS_NO AS csNo, DECODE(CS_GRADE,'2','탈퇴','회원') AS csGrade, CS_ID AS csId, CS_PS AS csPs, CS_NM AS csNm, CS_PHONE_ONE AS csPhoneOne, CS_PHONE_TWO AS csPhoneTwo, CS_PHONE_THREE AS csPhoneThree, CS_EMAIL_ONE AS csEmailOne, CS_EMAIL_TWO AS csEmailTwo, CREATE_DATE AS createDate, CS_ADDR_ONE AS csAddrOne, CS_ADDR_TWO AS csAddrTwo, CS_BIRTH_YEAR AS csBirthYear, CS_BIRTH_MONTH AS csBirthMonth, CS_BIRTH_DAY AS csBirthDay FROM CUSTOMER_INFO

/* csInfoMapper.selectDetailCsInfo */ SELECT CS_NO AS csNo, DECODE(CS_GRADE,'2','탈퇴','회원') AS csGrade, CS_ID AS csId, CS_PS AS csPs, CS_NM AS csNm, CS_PHONE_ONE AS csPhoneOne, CS_PHONE_TWO AS csPhoneTwo, CS_PHONE_THREE AS csPhoneThree, CS_EMAIL_ONE AS csEmailOne, CS_EMAIL_TWO AS csEmailTwo, CREATE_DATE AS createDate, CS_ADDR_ONE AS csAddrOne, CS_ADDR_TWO AS csAddrTwo, CS_BIRTH_YEAR AS csBirthYear, CS_BIRTH_MONTH AS csBirthMonth, CS_BIRTH_DAY AS csBirthDay FROM CUSTOMER_INFO WHERE CS_NO = #{csNo}
